name: Puzzle Master 2
summary: Puzzle Master 2 is an exciting full-featured jigsaw puzzle game in the Game Master Series. Using over 75 fantastic images provided, you can create jigsaw puzzles from 4 to 4,000 pieces. There are 5 different levels of difficulty to challenge the novice and expert alike! You can even create your own puzzles with your favorite images and music. The puzzles look so real and the music sounds so great! The hints, trays, shuffle and color arrangement features help you solve even the most challenging puzzles
